Package main

Class MarketWindow

java.lang.Object
main.MarketWindow
public class MarketWindow extends Object
GUI for the Market class. It displays Athletes and Items available for purchase by the Player as well as the Player's own items and athletes which can be sold back to the Market.
Version:
1.03
Author:
mdi48

  • Constructor Details

    • MarketWindow

      public MarketWindow(int x, int y)
      Constructor that creates the window and adds all of the graphical elements. By default this displays the Athletes available for purchase as well as those in the Players' Team. This can be toggled to show Items available for purchase and in the players' inventory.
      Parameters:
      x - used to inherit the horizontal position of the previous window
      y - used to inherit the vertical position of the previous window

  • Method Details

    • updateAthletePanels

      public static void updateAthletePanels()
      Constructor that creates the window and adds all of the graphical elements. By default this displays the Athletes available for purchase as well as those in the Players' Team. This can be toggled to show Items available for purchase and in the players' inventory.

    • updateItemPanels

      public static void updateItemPanels()
      Constructor that creates the window and adds all of the graphical elements. By default this displays the Athletes available for purchase as well as those in the Players' Team. This can be toggled to show Items available for purchase and in the players' inventory.

    • setupMode

      public void setupMode()
      Used to toggle the MarketWindow into 'setup' mode for creating the Players' Team during setup. In this mode the option to buy Items is hidden, and more Athletes are available for purchase than normal. The athletes also have their buyback prices set to match their purchase price, allowing buying and selling without net loss of money.
